data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Chitradurga, Karnataka, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chitradurga, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Chitradurga, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 18,255 believers in the county of Chitradurga to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, guide seekers in Chitradurga, Karnataka, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Vakkaliga people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Chitradurga. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, 1,659,500 people live in the county of Chitradurga. Please, give them 331 new simple churches this year.
Lord, make the 18,255 believers in Chitradurga to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,641,245 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

location.name: Chitradurga
location.people_groups_list: Balija Gopanthi, Bangar, Pale, Masan Jogi, Naikadaya
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Balija Gopanthi (7,900), Bangar (200), Pale (9,500), Masan Jogi (32,000), Naikadaya (200)
